title: Terrell Davis on the NFL finally getting it right, CBD and his legacy (Podcast)
itunes:title: Terrell Davis on the NFL finally getting it right, CBD and his legacy (Podcast)
description:
Hall of Famer and Super Bowl MVP Terrell Davis has some things to say about this turbulent world, through the lens of a businessman, philanthropist and father. In a timely and frank conversation with Jason Kelly and Mike Lynch, Davis -- co-founder of the CBD product company Defy -- recalls early encounters with the police in his native San Diego, the NFL's decision to reverse its stance on player protests, the future of Colin Kaepernick, helping himself and former players alleviate pain, and how he hopes his legacy transcends anything he accomplished on the football field.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
